Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Smith, FOUR, overpitched outside off, stands tall, no need for feet. Smashes it through the line straight past the stumps
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, overpitched on the pads, looks to whip it through the leg side and misses, raps him on the pads
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, 1 run, good length at middle stump, waits for it and turns it through square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, no run, good length, pushed across the angle from the right hander, who tries to chop it but gets a thick inside edge that bounces to the slip cordon
Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, 1 leg bye, full and on the pads, tries to flick it into the leg side, it sounded like an inside edge but signalled leg byes as it rolls towards deep square
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, back of a length outside off, goes back and punches towards mid-off, extra cover comes across and puts in a dive
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, no run, good length outside off, goes with his hands and slices it to backward point
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, 2 runs, 134 kph, back of a length at middle, opens up and slogs it to deep square leg's left
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, SIX, good length outside off, expands his arms and throws his bat at it, he's nowwhere near the pitch but he uses his reach to slice it over point
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, 1 leg bye, 139 kph, back of a length, angled into the batsman, raps him on the pads but he's the only one appealing, single down towards third man
Aamer Yamin to Smith, 1 run, full at off stump, driven to mid-off's left
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, no run, good length, angled in at middle and off, opens up to drive but has to fend it last minute into the covers

Sohail Tanvir to Smith, FOUR, back of a length in the corridor, uses the angle and slashes it past point, but third man runs across nicely and puts in a dive to his right...but it looks his foot has touched the boundary. Unlucky.
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, 1 leg bye, good length at the pads, tries to whip it past short fine, but it catches his pad
Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, no run, slower ball, good length, tossed outside off stump, goes for the slog sweep, inside edge onto pad

Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, 2 runs, back of a length, angled across off, he steps out and tries to swat this out of the country, gets a top edge...and Elliott has dropped it at long leg! Gets under it nicely but chooses to go low on this and floors it

Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, SIX, short in the corridor, tries to ramp it over the slip, and it's another dropped catch. Amir miscued it and it went low to third man's left, he too got under it - although it was flatter and quicker than the previous one - and put in a last ditch effort to catch it. Instead, lobs it towards the boundary...replays show that should've been a six.
Sohail Tanvir to Rafatullah Mohmand, 1 run, good length on off, opens the face and turns it down to third man
Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, 1 run, back of a length and into the batsman, who tries to pull but can't get connection, rolls to fine leg
Aamer Yamin to Smith, 1 run, full at middle, goes forward and hits across the line to flick it to deep square

Aamer Yamin to Rafatullah Mohmand, OUT, good length, angled down towards the leg side, but he steps out and cuts the angle down. Wants to slap this for six straight over the bowler, but gets a top edge that flies upwards and behind him where Rizwan spins and spins before holding on to this right
Wicket: ['Rafatullah Mohmand c †Mohammad Rizwan b Aamer Yamin 18 (13b 0x4 2x6) SR: 138.46']

Commentary: Aamer Yamin to Smith, 1 leg bye, angled full and down the leg side, raps him on the pads
Aamer Yamin to Haddin, no run, back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side
Aamer Yamin to Haddin, no run, rolls his fingers on this, good length outside off, expansive drive on the up, straight to covers
Narine to Smith, 1 run, good length outside off, gets low and swats it to deep midwicket...that reached the fielder in no time
Narine to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length outside off, tucks it off the back foot to long-on
Narine to Smith, no run, good length outside off, comes back into him, punched off the back foot to covers
Narine to Smith, 1 run, good length outside off, pushed to deep midwicket
Narine to Haddin, no run, drags the offspinner short outside off, but Haddin has shuffled across and cuts down his room, can only punch it to mid-off
Narine to Haddin, no run, short and wide outside off, pokes at it off the back foot and opens the face, but short third man is square and cuts it off
Aamer Yamin to Smith, no run, good length, angled into the pads, and catches him on it once more
Aamer Yamin to Smith, no run, good length, angled into him, nonchalant stab at it with no feet, lobs up towards midwicket who takes it on the bounce and has a shy at the non-strikers
Aamer Yamin to Smith, 1 run, good length at middle, turned away uncomfortably to deep square with no feet movement

Aamer Yamin to Haddin, OUT, 135 kph, lights up the stumps! Haddin has seen Yamin's angle enough to know how it's going to come at him, and gives him the charge to try and slog it past midwicket, but he gets and inside edge onto the stumps
Aamer Yamin to Duckett, no run, short and wide outside off, his feet are rooted as he throws his bat at it and gets beaten
Aamer Yamin to Duckett, no run, back of a length at off stump, defended into the covers
Yasir Shah to Smith, SIX, ....and goes out of the park first ball! Drops it short outside off, hangs back and slaps it flat over the midwicket fence

Yasir Shah to Smith, OUT, he's got his revenge! Hits a good length outside off, drags him forward, sneaks past his inside edge with the straighter one and catches his pads. The keeper pulled out of the appeal but Yasir was convinced and so was the umpire
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, tossed up at off stump, driven past the bowler who dived over it. Long-off gets work to do
Yasir Shah to Duckett, no run, tossed up in the blockhole at middle, tries to turn it into the leg side, inside edge onto the boot
Wicket: ['DR Smith lbw b Yasir Shah 20 (17b 2x4 1x6) SR: 117.64']

Commentary: Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, good length at off stump, bunted into the off side off the back foot
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, slider, drops it short at middle, Misbah tries to power it through the leg side off his back foot, inside edge onto the boot
Narine to Duckett, 1 run, good length at leg stump, punched towards midwicket
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full on the pads, flicked to deep square
Narine to Duckett, 1 run, tossed up on a good length at middle stump, Duckett doesn't get to the pitch as he slices this to deep cover
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length outside off, shapes for the sweep but has to adjust and use an angled bat to poke it to short third

Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, good length outside off, this time he premeditates the reverse sweep - and McCullum spots it and moves to his right at slip. Unfortunately, he's stepped too far across and it flies past his left foot
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, good length outside off, puts in a big stride and stretches fully to connect the sweep, but gets on top of it too much and can only turn it straight to short fine
Yasir Shah to Duckett, no run, good length at off, wants to push it to long-off, hits it back to the bowler
Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, good length outside off, once again, not to the pitch as he uses his wrists to turn it through square leg last minute. Hard hands from Duckett

Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, massive! Exposes his stumps, stands tall, dares the bowler to toss it up - he does. Swings his arms at this and smashes it straight over Yasir and it slams into the roof and falls down into the stands. 95 metres.
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full outside off, driven off the front foot to deep cover
Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, good length at leg stump, miscues the reverse sweep and it goes harmlessly to backward point
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, good length outside off, pushed to cover
Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, no run, good length at off stump, pushes it back to the bowler off the back foot
Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, no run, back of a length, angled across the left-hander from over the wicket, pushed to point
Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, no run, back of a length, angled across, goes for the back foot punch, gets it off the bottom of the bat straight to covers

Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, FOUR, 132 kph, anticipates his angle and walks towards it. A little shimmy outside off and uses his pace to lift him past short fine leg and it looks like it has caught the ropes on the full...third umpire looking at this...and it's given four. That was a little bizzare. Clearly seemed to have caught the rope on the full.
Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, no run, back of a length angled across, goes for the pull, hits the top of the bat and bounces towards midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Duckett, 1 run, back of a length in the corridor, punched to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, back of a length at middle, steps down, not even close to the pitch as he pushes it to deep square
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, backs way again, punched off the back foot to McCullum who runs 5 yards and puts in a dive
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, good length outside off, backs away and slaps it over cover using his reach
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length on the pad, glanced square off his thigh
Yasir Shah to Duckett, no run, back of a length outside off, steps out and pushes it back to the bowler. Duckett is struggling against spin, stepping out every ball
Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, steps out at the good length ball, not to the pitch again, and has to improvise a sweep to deep square
Aamer Yamin to Duckett, 1 run, good length, angled into the left-hander and he doesn't connect on the attempted flick and cops it on his body

Aamer Yamin to Misbah-ul-Haq, OUT, got him! Good length, pitches outside off and nips back in, but Misbah has followed the line and not the movement. Pokes at it with no feet, gets a healthy inside edge through to the keeper. At least it sounded like, Misbah is not happy at all
Aamer Yamin to Watson, no run, good length outside off, pushed on the up to cover
Aamer Yamin to Watson, no run, back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to mid-off

Aamer Yamin to Watson, 2 runs, dropped.Goes for the bouncer, he connects his hook nicely from outside off, it's in the air but dipping at deep square leg, where Irfan Jr. puts in a good effort to even go for that, but can't pouch it
Wicket: ['Misbah-ul-Haq c †Mohammad Rizwan b Aamer Yamin 16 (13b 1x4 1x6) SR: 123.07']

Commentary: Aamer Yamin to Watson, 2 runs, ...and that effort is followed by a misfield as two fielders converge at this leg glance into the square leg region and both let it go
Yasir Shah to Duckett, 1 run, dropped short at middle, goes back and pulls it to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Watson, 1 run, good length outside off, goes forward and pushes it to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Duckett, OUT, puts him out of his misery. Premeditates a switch hit, exposes all his stumps as he swipes at this full ball on off stump and misses it altogether
Yasir Shah to Shadab Khan, 1 run, short and wide, punches it to sweeper cover off the back foot
Yasir Shah to Watson, 1 run, good length outside off, punches off the back foot to long-off
Yasir Shah to Shadab Khan, no run, short and wide, cuts it straight to backward point
Narine to Watson, 1 run, good length at off stump, punhced off the back foot to covers, who puts in a dive and parries it towards the mid-off region
Narine to Shadab Khan, 1 run, good length outside off, wants to drive this on the up, bat turns and it rolls down to long-off
Narine to Watson, no run, good length outside off, goes forward and pushes it slightly uppishly towards covers

Narine to Watson, OUT, goes forward and tries to push this across the line into the leg side, catches his front pad and the umpire raises the finger...Watson is not happy either, did he nick that? Nope. Replays show it's plumb. Struck in front of middle and off and hitting middle halfway.
Narine to Amad Butt, no run, good length, offspinner fired at off stump, front foot defence
Narine to Amad Butt, no run, good length outside off, forward defence
Elliott to Shadab Khan, 1 run, back of a length outside off, hangs back and uses his wrists to turn it to deep square off the back foot
Elliott to Amad Butt, 1 run, back of a length at middle, pushed to deep midwicket off the back foot
Elliott to Amad Butt, no run, back of a length outside off, punched towards deep cover, but extra cover puts in a super dive

Elliott to Amad Butt, SIX, dropped. Back of a length outside off, slogs it across the line, the fielder ran to his left and just about mistimed his jump as he missed this at the deep midwicket. The umpire can't get this one wrong, it's six
Elliott to Amad Butt, no run, good length outside off, pushed to covers off the front foot
Elliott to Amad Butt, 2 runs, back of a length, slides it into the pads, flicked behind square. Deep square runs in hard and goes one handed, doesn't get it cleanly and over runs to concede another
Narine to Shadab Khan, 1 run, back of a length outside off, goes back and slices it to short third man
Narine to Amad Butt, 1 leg bye, tossed up on the pads, tries to flick it but sparese connection on this
Narine to Shadab Khan, 1 run, back of a length at off, opens the face and runs it to short third man
Narine to Amad Butt, 1 run, full at middle, punched down to long-on
Narine to Shadab Khan, 1 run, back of a length at middle, goes back and turns it using his wrists towards long leg
Narine to Amad Butt, FOUR, good length outside off, gets nice and low and middles his sweep nicely to bisect deep square and deep midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover's right
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, 1 run, back of a length, angled in at the off stump, uses soft hands to drop it into the off side towards point
Mohammad Irfan to Amad Butt, 1 run, finds the blockhole at middle stump, jams it out off his toes to deep square
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, 1 run, yoker at middle stump, charges at him and drives it to long-off
Mohammad Irfan to Amad Butt, no run, yorker outside off, has to really reach out at this, but can't get bat on it
Mohammad Irfan to Amad Butt, no run, sensational bowling. Nails his fourth consecutive yorker. This one is also outside off, and sneaks under the batsman's attempted drive
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, SIX, slower delivery from around the wicket, drops it too short, it sits up for him and he hammers it off the back foot straight over the bowler
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, short and into the rib cage, just about gets under it and pulls it to deep square leg with little control
Sohail Tanvir to Amad Butt, 1 run, goes for the yorker, it falls slightly short, overpitched at middle, angles in and he slogs it - grounded - straight to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, no run, back of a length outside off, wants to use the angle to ramp it between keeper and short fine, but just misses out. Tanvir needs to sort out his line and length
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, no run, and he does. Sort of. Slower ball, good length outside off, gets on one knee to slog sweep, but it's way too slow and he's through with his shot early
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, yorker at middle stump, thick inside edge on his attempted swat through the leg side, goes straight to short fine who shies and misses
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, SIX, misses his length, it's a full toss, knee-height at middle, shuffles across and lifts it easily over fine leg
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, FOUR, geez! Back of a length outside off and he's hit this disdainfully past covers - no feet, stand and deliver on the up
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, 1 leg bye, yorker down the leg side, might have been a wide, but catches his pad
Mohammad Irfan to Amad Butt, 1 run, yorker outside off, jammed down to long-off

Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, SIX, what a shot! This is some talent on display from Shadab. It's overpitched outside off, he's put his back foot two yards back and across, front foot rooted, body crouched right below to contort and get under the ball as he ramps it over short-fine leg. Incredible.
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, no run, goes for the bouncer and beats his attempted upper cut

Sohail Tanvir to Amad Butt, OUT, overpitched at off, not a great length, but the batsman has discovered that it's a slower ball. Bat swing is through too early, it catches the bottom and balloons to McCullum at mid-off
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, slower ball, full outside off, slices off the outside edge to third man
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, 1 run, full slower ball outside off, slices it to third man after shaping up to slog
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 2 runs, bouncer at his chest, gets tangled up and in the end only manages to lift it over point
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, FOUR, full toss on the pads, midwicket is in, Shadab only has to get it past him, and does

Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, OUT, length ball at middle, but doesn't connect the pull shot. It goes to long-on, Sami comes back for a sacrifical second, but the throw has gone to the other end where the keeper whips the bails off
